en.subject: Notice: You Must Confirm Your %REGION% Accommodations
en.body:
Dear %TO_FIRSTNAME% %TO_LASTNAME%,
This is a notice to inform you that %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% has assigned you the following accommodations during your rotation in %REGION%.
In order to complete the process you must now review and confirm with the %DEPARTMENT_TITLE% office that you accept these accommodations. Please click the following link and log into %APPLICATION_NAME% to continue:
%CONFIRMATION_URL%
Should you have any questions or concerns please contact %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% in the %DEPARTMENT_TITLE% office for further information.
Sincerely,
%DEPARTMENT_TITLE% Office
